Title: #122: Col. Littleton—The Art of Craftsmanship
Description:
Col. Littleton: This designer and small-business owner is known for his upscale, hand-crafted leather goods sold all over the world. He’s also an EntreLeader who truly believes in following the Golden Rule. We’re also featuring a lesson from Dave on gratitude and team recognition.

Another great episode sponsored by our friends at Infusionsoft
